MaskPattern.Expression: ^ *(ip msdp password peer \S+|ip msdp vrf \S+ password peer \S+)( ?\d?) +(\S*) *(.*)$

MaskPattern.Replacement: ppp pap sent-username xxxxxxxx password $2 xxxxxxxx
ppp pap sent-username xxxxxxxx password xxxxxxxx
set localuser user xxxxxxxx password xxxxxxxx privilege $3
snmp-server host inside $1 community xxxxxxxx version 2c
snmp-server host $1 vrf $2 informs version 2c xxxxxxxx $4
snmp-server host $1 vrf $2 informs version 1 xxxxxxxx $4
snmp-server host $1 vrf $2 informs version 3 $3 xxxxxxxx
snmp-server host $1 vrf $2 informs version 3 $3 xxxxxxxx $5
snmp-server host $1 vrf $2 traps version 2c xxxxxxxx $4
snmp-server host $1 vrf $2 traps version 1 xxxxxxxx $4
snmp-server host $1 vrf $2 traps version 3 $3 xxxxxxxx
snmp-server host $1 vrf $2 traps version 3 $3 xxxxxxxx $5

MaskPattern.Expression: ^ *(snmp-server user) (\S+) (.*auth (md5|sha)) (\S+) (priv aes-128|priv aes 128|priv aes 192|priv aes 256|priv 3des|priv des|priv) (\S+)(.*)$

MaskPattern.Replacement: snmp-server user $1 $2 $3 auth $4 $5 xxxxxx priv $7 $8 xxxxxx
snmp-server user $1 $2 $3 auth $4 $5 xxxxxx priv $7 $8 xxxxxx $10
username xxxxxxxx password xxxxxxxx encrypted privilege $3
wlccp ap username xxxxxxxx password $2 xxxxxxxx
wlccp ap username xxxxxxxx password xxxxxxx
